document_data.name: Chasler Belvrost
document_data.mainbody: '''Chasler Belvrost''' was a member of the [[Belvrost]] clan of [[mage]]s.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, he was one of the best-known and most influential members of the [[Belvrost]] clan in [[Reddansyr]]. He owned a flour mill on the river [[Reddan]], west of town.
